typesOfThreat.description: This website has a negative / poor reputation score. This means that the website is likely to be untrustworthy.
This website is flagged for tricking individuals into revealing sensitive information, such as banking information.
This website is flagged for containing malicious software, which can harm your computer and allow people to steal data and information.
This website is flagged for potentially manipulating users into providing confidential information.
This website is flagged for containing harmful and unwanted software, which can be misleading and deceptive.
This website is flagged for scamming. A scammer might try to fool you into giving money or personal information.
This website is flagged for Brand Impersonation. This is when someone pretends to be a well-known or real company to trick users financially or with information.
